org.jgroups.stack
Class ProtocolStack.RefCounter

java.lang.Object
  org.jgroups.stack.ProtocolStack.RefCounter
Enclosing class:
ProtocolStack
public static class ProtocolStack.RefCounter
extends java.lang.Object

Keeps track of the number os times init()/destroy() and start()/stop have been called. The variables init_count and start_count are incremented or decremented accoordingly. Note that this class is not synchronized
